name: Synthetic Camera
description:
This is a magical APP, like your hero face become your face! Are you a fan of the game, is not ready to try it, Come download it!
Use skills:
1 select any one of the photo templates for shooting
2 to shoot you or someone else's head.
3 use a single finger to move, double finger to rotate and scale and rotate, so that the avatar is aligned with the template
4 press share, the picture will be saved to the album
